title: [Abandoned Farm, Forest]
description: A wickedly steep slope leads to the south, the pale sunlight glinting from its smooth, mirror-like surface.  Splintered hafts and handles of some long-destroyed implements litter the ground and protrude from the trunks of dead trees, having been forced harshly into the once-living wood.
